Huang Shigong, also known as Xia Huanggong 夏黃公|夏黄公[Xia4 Huang2 gong1] (dates of birth and death uncertain), Daoist hermit of the Qin Dynasty 秦代[Qin2 dai4] and purported author

“Three Strategies of Huang Shigong”, also known as Taigong Bingfa 太公兵法[Tai4 gong1 Bing1 fa3], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1], variously attributed to Jiang Ziya 姜子牙|姜子牙[Jiang1 Zi3 ya2], Huang Shigong 黃石公|黄石公[Huang2 Shi2 gong1] or an anonymous author

sentences.english: A trumpeter swan glides across the surface of the Yellowstone River.
sentences.chinese: 一隻號手天鵝正遊過黃石河的水面。

sentences.english: Native Americans have lived in the Yellowstone region for at least 11, 000 years.[6]
sentences.chinese: 印第安人已經在黃石地區至少生活了11000年。

sentences.english: But from the Fishing Bridge you can take a boat excursion on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們可以從釣魚橋乘船遊覽黃石湖。

sentences.english: 8A wolf pack is bedded down in the snow in Yellowstone national park.
sentences.chinese: 一羣狼正在以黃石國家公園的雪地爲牀，休養生息。

sentences.english: Tianhuang stone. , a mixture of nacrite and dickite in varying proportions.
sentences.chinese: 田黃石，是珍珠石與地開石成不同比例的混合物。

sentences.english: Exxon oil spill in Mont. river prompts evacuations.
sentences.chinese: 埃克森美孚石油泄漏至黃石河，下游居民疏散。

sentences.english: Most of my colleagues and I took a shuttle up to and down to the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 我和大部分同事都是坐索道上下黃石寨的山。

sentences.english: At the bottom you'll see Yellowstone River winding through the colorful canyon.
sentences.chinese: 在峽谷底我們可看到黃石河穿梭在五彩繽紛的峽谷中。

sentences.english: Later, American trappers rendered the French name in English as "Yellow Stone."
sentences.chinese: 後來，美國獵人用英語翻譯了法語名字爲“黃石”。

sentences.english: Dark clouds roll over Paria Canyon- Vermillion Cliffs Wilderness in Utah.
sentences.chinese: 烏雲向猶他州帕里亞峽谷的黃石公園席捲而來。

sentences.english: Scientists at the YVO closely monitor the Yellowstone region for such precursors.
sentences.chinese: 在釩酸釔科學家密切留意這類前體黃石地區。

sentences.english: Now, why would a salted egg yolk oil problems can be explained.
sentences.chinese: 現在，爲什麼只鹹蛋黃石油問題都可以得到解釋。

sentences.english: The development of Huangshi textile clothing industry has its inherent inferior position.
sentences.chinese: 黃石市紡織服裝業的發展有先天不足之劣勢。

sentences.english: The Norris Geyser Basin contains the hottest water in all of Yellowstone National Park.
sentences.chinese: 諾里斯間歇泉盆地擁有整個黃石國家公園最熱的水。

sentences.english: The fifth part puts forward the future strategy and route choices of Huangshi investment promotion.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分提出了新時期黃石的招商理念和路徑轉變。

sentences.english: Reconstruction of the existing Wong Shek Public Pier, which is partly within Sai Kung East Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 重建部分位於西貢東郊野公園內的黃石公衆碼頭。
